resources.string: Use the Search for Car button to scan for car. Make sure your device is plugged in and ready to go. Below are various location that the OBD plug can be at.
Enter your vehicle\'s mileage and VIN. Below are the various location that the VIN scanner code can be at.
Access to the camera is needed for barcode detection
This application cannot run because it does not have the camera permission. The application will now exit.
Face detector dependencies cannot be downloaded due to low device storage
Access to device location is needed for bluetooth feature

With Pitstop, we deliver the power of service to the convenience of the smartphone. Pitstop provides real-time notifications on recommended services and diagnostic reports, directly to the user\'s smartphone.

With PitStop, we deliver the power of service to the convenience of the smartphone. Pitstop provides real-time notifications on recommended services and diagnostic reports, directly to the user\'s smartphone.
Turn on your bluetooth connection in order to connect to the module.
Turn on your internet connection in order for us to tell you what\'s going on with your car
Turn your car on in order for the module to send data back to the app
Please pick a time for your service
Please pick a date for your service
Let\'s be proactive and book your vehicle\'s 1st service appointment today.

Pitstop has calculated an estimated time we believe you will be due for your 1st service appointment.

When your appointment is getting close, we will send you a reminder letting you know you whether or not you are due for service.

The power of being connected.

The tires on your vehicle are what keep it rolling. They take a beating from sharp turns, rocks, potholes, changes in temperature and the wear from friction on the road. It\'s time for you to inspect tire pressure and wear. Tires in poor condition can cause other mechanical parts to wear out faster.
Change engine oil and replace engine filter to remove contaminants and prolong the life of your motor.
Visibility is a critical part of safety while driving. Making sure your fluids are topped up and windshield wipers are intact is an important way to make sure your car is safe to drive.

Send an emergency request to the dealership to help you get your vehicle into the shop. Breakdowns are frustrating we are here to help. Be aware of the hours of operation of the dealership, after hours you may need to call a tow truck yourself.
Request for the dealership to coordinate a loaner vehicle or a shuttle to pick you up from your location.

This test app is design for technicians to collect vehicle data which is allows Pitstop to predict engine failures. Enter your email so we can send you a $100 gift card on every 30 vehicles that you test.
Connect to the device to start testing. Please make sure the device is plugged in and the vehicle engine is running.
